= Introduction =

An easy to use, cross platform, c++ based framework for games. Currently perfect for fast 2d game development, including menu structures and achievements and progressing every day into a complete framework for allmost anyt game.

Major c++ knowledge is not required, but a bit of coding/scripting experience, or some effort, is advised.

Currently the build targets supported are: Pandora (Angstrom linux ARM), Linux x86 (32/64 bit), Windows(32/64 bit), GP2X(Beta). More will come.

Most recent, and most extensive project using Penjin is [http://code.google.com/p/pandorapanic/ PandoraPanic]
